functions.name: validateToken
functions.description: Validates a JWT token and returns the claims

functions.name: generateToken
functions.signature: fun generateToken(userId: String, role: Role): Result<String>

types.name: Role
types.definition: enum class Role { ADMIN, USER, GUEST }

types.name: TokenClaims
types.definition: data class TokenClaims(userId: String, role: Role, exp: Long, iat: Long)

types.name: TokenConfig
types.definition: data class TokenConfig(secret: String, expiresInSeconds: Long, issuer: String?)

classes.name: TokenExpiredException
classes.signature: class TokenExpiredException(message: String, cause: Throwable?) : Exception
classes.description: Exception thrown when token has expired

classes.name: InvalidTokenException
classes.signature: class InvalidTokenException(message: String, cause: Throwable?) : Exception
classes.description: Exception thrown when token is invalid
